name: 胡心卉
objective:
Chapter 1: An Overview of VLSI
Part 1: Silicon Logic
Chapter 2: Logic Design With MOSFETs
Chapter 3: Physical Structure of CMOS Integrated Circuits
Chapter 4: Fabrication of CMOS Integrated Circuits
Chapter 5: Elements of Physical Design
Part 2: The Logic-Electronics Interface
Chapter 6: Electrical Characteristics of MOSFETs
Chapter 7: Electronic Analysis of CMOS Logic Gates
Chapter 8: Designing High-Speed CMOS Logic Networks
Chapter 9: Advanced Techniques in CMOS Logic Circuits
schedule:
1.An Overview of VLSI
2.Logic Design With MOSFETs
3.Logic Design With MOSFETs
4.Physical Structure of CMOS Integrated Circuits
5.Physical Structure of CMOS Integrated Circuits
6.Fabrication of CMOS Integrated Circuits
7.Fabrication of CMOS Integrated Circuits
8.Elements of Physical Design
9.Mid-term Exam
10.Elements of Physical Design
11.Electrical Characteristics of MOSFETs
12.Electrical Characteristics of MOSFETs
13.Electronic Analysis of CMOS Logic Gates
14.Electronic Analysis of CMOS Logic Gates
15.Designing High-Speed CMOS Logic Networks
16.Designing High-Speed CMOS Logic Networks
17.Advanced Techniques in CMOS Logic Circuits
18.Final Exam
materials:
1.John P.Uyemura, “Introduction to VLSI Circuits and Systems”, John Wiley & Sons, INC., 全華圖書。
2.Wayne Wolf, “Modern VLSI Design；IP-Based Design/Fourth Edition ”, Prentice Hall PRT, 偉明圖書。
